class.name: SkeletonModification3D
class.brief_description: A resource that operates on bones in a [Skeleton3D].
class.description: This resource provides an interface that can be expanded so code that operates on bones in a [Skeleton3D] can be mixed and matched together to create complex interactions. This is used to provide Godot with a flexible and powerful Inverse Kinematics solution that can be adapted for many different uses.

method.name: execute
method.description: Executes the given modification. This is where the modification performs whatever function it is designed to do.

method.name: setup_modification
method.description: Sets up the modification so it can be executed. This function should be called automatically by the [SkeletonModificationStack3D] containing this modification. If you need to initialize a modification before use, this is the place to do it!

members.member: When true, the modification's [method execute] function will be called by the [SkeletonModificationStack3D].
